name: Escape Dungeon (LwallEE)
description:
My first project : A Rpg puzzle game. You role a knight who is stucked in the dungeon and find the way to escape. There are a lot of trap and puzzle you must solve to escape and a lot of hidden places for you to discover. This is my first project so it still has a lot of mistakes and bug, I really look forward to your feedback for the my next project. And finnally, hope you enjoy with my game.

Source assest:
